companies.name: Google
companies.description: Google is a multinational technology company specializing in internet services, cloud computing, AI, and consumer electronics.

companies.name: Amazon
companies.description: Amazon is a global e-commerce and cloud computing company, known for AWS, retail marketplace, and consumer technology.

companies.name: Meta
companies.description: Meta (formerly Facebook) is a social technology company building products for connecting people and the metaverse.

companies.name: Apple
companies.description: Apple designs and manufactures consumer electronics, software, and services including iPhone, Mac, and iOS.

companies.name: Microsoft
companies.description: Microsoft develops software, cloud services, and hardware including Windows, Azure, and Xbox.

companies.name: Netflix
companies.description: Netflix is a streaming entertainment service offering movies, TV series, and original content worldwide.

companies.name: Salesforce
companies.description: Salesforce is a cloud-based CRM platform helping businesses manage customer relationships and sales.

companies.name: Stripe
companies.description: Stripe provides payment processing infrastructure for internet businesses worldwide.

companies.name: JPMorgan Chase
companies.description: JPMorgan Chase is a global financial services firm offering banking, investment, and asset management.

companies.name: Goldman Sachs
companies.description: Goldman Sachs is a leading global investment banking and financial services company.

companies.name: Morgan Stanley
companies.description: Morgan Stanley provides investment banking, securities, and wealth management services.

companies.name: Bank of America
companies.description: Bank of America is a major financial institution serving consumers, businesses, and institutions.

companies.name: UnitedHealth Group
companies.description: UnitedHealth Group is a healthcare company offering insurance and health services.

companies.name: Johnson & Johnson
companies.description: Johnson & Johnson develops medical devices, pharmaceuticals, and consumer health products.

companies.name: Pfizer
companies.description: Pfizer is a global pharmaceutical company developing medicines and vaccines.

companies.name: Walmart
companies.description: Walmart is the world's largest retailer, operating stores and e-commerce globally.

companies.name: Nike
companies.description: Nike designs and manufactures athletic footwear, apparel, and equipment.

companies.name: Disney
companies.description: Disney is a global entertainment company with theme parks, media networks, and streaming.

companies.name: Boeing
companies.description: Boeing is an aerospace company manufacturing commercial jets, defense systems, and space vehicles.

companies.name: SpaceX
companies.description: SpaceX designs and manufactures rockets and spacecraft for space exploration and satellite deployment.
